channel.title: typescript on From An Egg
channel.description: Recent content in typescript on From An Egg

item.title: Conditional data types with TypeScript
item.description: When dealing with data that’s returned from an API you don’t always have control over the exact structure which can make it a bit of a challenge to add types to that data with TypeScript to improve the developer experience. I have recently run into this issue when hooking up the Juju Dashboard to a new API endpoint that sends deltas every time there is a change in the users environment.
